game_description: Check the full game at https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3767842406602776/ Kangaroos are trying to steal your beer! Throw boomerangs in VR to survive the wildlife chaos. Cook for your mates, and save your Aussie BBQ! Have increasingly perilous BBQs where you survive against different animals, in different scenarios and cook different food! Full game Features: Fully Physics-based interactions A campaign mode with 15 levels (6 hours of gameplay) An endless arcade mode (Infinite gameplay, be the highest score!) Lovely Annoying Australian Fauna Beer skins Boomerang skins Vegetarian BBQ alternatives Non-Alcoholic drink alternatives Tons of accessibility options
review_1: The game is really fun but the only thing I would ask for is arcade because just throwing the boomerang and catching it is so satisfying.
review_2: Having fun with demo on Q2. When can I $ full version? Great job Devsüëç
review_3: I love this game I think it's a brilliant idea for a game. Considering it's only a demo it's absolutely fantastic and I love the design of em Kangaroo's. It's a very fun game and the time just flew by. I can't wait to see the full version of the Game.
review_4: Soooo much fun like she said befor me, never bored!! Make sure u eat and rest befor u play I turned around and 2 hrs had past!ü§£ and it's only the demo!!Multitasking dream game gotta hav the fool plz do more!!!
review_5: Love this game I even joined the discord. Recommend getting this when it fully releases
